Testing Instructions

  1. Click on any color input above
  2. The custom color picker should appear instead of the OS picker
  3. Test the saturation/lightness area by clicking and dragging
  4. Test the hue slider
  5. Test the eyedropper tool (if supported)
  6. Enter a hex value directly in the hex input field
  7. Select colors to build up the recent colors palette
  8. Click a recent color to quickly apply it
